txt.en: 'So very sorry.'
The picnic has been saved. The rain even cooled things down!
'I shall go home.'
'No food for me then?'
<rgb=#FF0000>Oh no! All your food has been ruined!</rgb>
'Approaching hungry hobbit are after the picnic!'
'Oh no! Bugs!'
'Don't let the rain ruin your picnic!'
Delicious! Delightful! Perfection!
<rgb=#FF0000>Penny has succumbed to the heat!</rgb>
Thwarted a chatty hobbit!
Picked carrots ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Removed some clover
'These pies look delicious!'
'Do not mind if I do.'
'I am sure I was invited.'
'What a feast!'
'For me? You shouldn't have!'
'This looks tasty indeed!'
'Simply delicious!'
'If you put it that way....'
'Oh my, how rude of me.'
Have a picnic on the picnic blanket
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not let your food get eaten by hungry hobbits, eaten by bugs, or ruined and soggy from the rains!</rgb>
Enjoy a lovely picnic
<rgb=#FF0000>Penny must not succumb to the heat!</rgb>
Feed Penny some carrots.
'What is this?! Hungry hobbit, bugs, an rain threaten to ruin your picnic!'
'Let me tell you about the weather...'
'Have you heard the latest on those Sackville-Bagginses?'
Thwart chatty hobbits
'I have even more to tell you, if you wish to hear it!'
'It is all true, mark my words.'
Pick carrots for Penny ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'You are such a good listener!'
Feed Penny some carrots
Talk to Fosco Farfield
Reach the stream and cool off
Remove distracting clover from the path
Cool off at the next watering hole
Have a picnic on the picnic blanket.
Gathered picnic supplies ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Reach the perfect picnic spot
Unpack the pony
Have a lovely picnic with not a single interruption.
'You lost some food!'
'Munch munch!'
'Now that was a delicious feast, and well worth the adventure. Perhaps we shall go on another picnic again soon!'
Talk to Will Whitfoot
You carefully load up Fosco Farfield's pony with the picnic things, and are soon quite ready to set off for the picnicking spot.

'If you wish to borrow old Penny here for your picnic, I see no problem with that. She's a good-natured thing, and will trot right along if you are good to her. There are carrots up the way as make a good travelling snack. Steer clear of clover, though, or she'll be all day about it!\n\n'Do see that she stops and cools down at both the stream and the watering hole along the way. I want her hale and hearty tomorrow for apple-picking. Now if you will excuse me, it is hotter than a Took's oven out here! Why you and the Mayor chose today for your outing is beyond me!'

Somehow the provisions survived the heat, water, mirages, and the winding path up road and hill in perfect condition. Quickly, and hungrily, you lay the things out on the blanket Mayor Whitfoot has spread.
Penny is well fed, rested, and ready for the final leg of the expedition!
<rgb=#00FFFF>Encounter: It is hot everywhere, but here the air truly shimmers with it</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFFF>Encounter: The heat must be getting to you - or was that really something ghastly up ahead?</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFFF>Encounter: Something pesky lingers nearby, looking to ruin your picnic!</rgb>
Thwart hungry hobbits with a light <rgb=#00ff00>slap</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Penny must not succumb to the heat!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Penny must not succumb to the heat!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Penny must not succumb to the heat!</rgb>
'Hullo! Where are you going?'
'Fine I will leave, but this is highly inhospitable!'
'Fine, I shall gossip elsewhere.'
Pack your supplies on Penny.
'How rude.'

'There you are, [placeholder]! I was beginning to wonder where you had got to. Well, but I ought to say thank you for inviting me along, all the same! Now we had better get a move on. We have a way to go - and none too swiftly, either, if we stumble across many nosy folk along the way - and I should like to have finished eating before afternoon tea!\n\n'As you can see, I have gathered us quite a spread. Now you help gather up and load these things on the pony while I try to think what's missing. I feel quite certain I am forgetting something of great importance!'
'Well come on now, gather the things up and load them on the pony while I think. It isn't easy, trying to remember what you've forgot!'
'Now don't drop anything. Quick, load the pony with all that!'
'Like I said, be good to Penny and she'll be good to you. Feed her carrots but avoid clover patches if you ever want to get where you're going!'
'Penny has reached the watering hole!'
'My hat will keep me dry, but not the food!'
'This is a good place to cool off on such a hot day!'
'If you please, I would like to eat!'
'It is so hot, how will you even make it where you are going?'
'Is it true you and Mayor Whitfoot are going on a picnic?'
'Ice... cold... pints....'
'Once you cool down in the watering hole, you won't want to leave.'
'Well now, you might just reach that picnic spot after all!'
'You are almost there!'
'The picnic spot is just up that hill!'
'Leaving already?'
The Perfect Picnic
'I do not like small crawling things and do not wish to share my food with them!'
'Simply grand!'
'Oh bother, these bugs look to ruin my meal!'
'Delicious!'
Gather up the picnic supplies.
<rgb=#00FFFF>Encounter Complete: You have beat the heat... for now</rgb>
'Oh bother.'
'Where did all the food go?'
What a grand day for a picnic!
To the picnic spot!
'Now I am getting wet!'
<rgb=#00FFFF>Encounter Complete: You have saved the picnic... for now!</rgb>
'It sure is hot out!'
Thwarted a hungry hobbit!
Gather up the picnic supplies ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'This heat is troublesome!'
'A refreshing dip in the stream was just the thing!'
'Oh my! Is that a mirage?!'
Load Penny with the picnic supplies
'These mirages keep getting bigger!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Penny has succumbed to the heat!</rgb>
'This watering hole has given you the strength to continue, but Penny looks hungry!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Penny has succumbed to the heat!</rgb>
'What ho! The final climb to the perfect picnic stop awaits!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Penny has succumbed to the heat!</rgb>
'There it is! The best spot for a picnic in all the Shire!'
'Now, what was it I forgot? Hmm...'
'Uninvited guests?!'
'Finally, time to eat and enjoy the day!'
Talk to Farmer Fosco Farfield and Mayor Will Whitfoot.
'Penny has reached the stream!'
'Why that's it. I forgot my hat!'
'How many Hobbits did we invite? There might not be enough food!'
'Lovely, just lovely!'
Reach the stream with Penny and cool off. Don't get caught up by any chatty hobbits. They'll only slow you down!
'I will meet you there. It is important to keep the sun out of my eyes while I eat!'
'Now that things have cooled off a bit, let us eat!'
Reach the watering hole with Penny and get some more relief from the heat.
'You made it! What took you so long?'
'Why look! A rainbow!'
Reach the perfect picnic spot with Penny. The clover along the way might distract her and cause a delay!
''Oh no! Bugs and hungry hobbit are after the picnic!'
'No matter least I found my hat.'
'Hey presto!'
You have reached the picnic spot and found Will Whitfoot waiting. Time to unpack the picnic things and lay out the feast!
'Let us get this picnic underway. I am famished!'
